```{r load-wrangle-historical-nsse}

# load historical NSSE files, selecting only vars of interest

nsse03 <- import(
  here("data", "NSSE03 Data (UO).sav"), 
  setclass = "tbl_df") %>% 
  select(studid,
         classran,
         cocurr01,
         workof01,
         workon01) %>% 
  filter(classran == "1") %>% 
  mutate(year = "2003",
         studid = as.numeric(studid),
         tmworkonhrs =
           case_when(
             workon01 == '1' ~ 0,
             workon01 == '2' ~ 3,
             workon01 == '3' ~ 8,
             workon01 == '4' ~ 13,
             workon01 == '5' ~ 18,
             workon01 == '6' ~ 23,
             workon01 == '7' ~ 28,
             workon01 == '8' ~ 33),
         tmworkoffhrs =
           case_when(
             workof01 == '1' ~ 0,
             workof01 == '2' ~ 3,
             workof01 == '3' ~ 8,
             workof01 == '4' ~ 13,
             workof01 == '5' ~ 18,
             workof01 == '6' ~ 23,
             workof01 == '7' ~ 28,
             workof01 == '8' ~ 33),
         tmworkhrs = tmworkonhrs + tmworkoffhrs) %>% 
  rename(IRclass = classran,
         studentid = studid,
         tmcocurr = cocurr01)
```

```{r}

nsse_historical <- bind_rows(nsse03, nsse06, nsse09,
                        nsse12, nsse15, nsse17,
                        nsse19, nsse22) %>% 
   mutate(tmcocurr_binned = 
           case_when(
             tmcocurr == '1' | tmcocurr == '2' ~ 'Low', 
             tmcocurr == '3' | tmcocurr == '4' ~ 'Moderate', 
             tmcocurr == '5' | tmcocurr == '6' | 
               tmcocurr == '7' | tmcocurr == '8' ~ 'High'),
          tmworkhrs_binned = cut(tmworkhrs, 
                                breaks = c(-Inf, 1, 11, 21, Inf),
                                labels = c("None", "1-10", "11-20", "More than 20"),
                                right = FALSE)) %>% 
  select(year,
         studentid,
         IRclass,
         tmcocurr,
         tmcocurr_binned,
         tmworkhrs,
         tmworkhrs_binned) %>% 
  left_join(enr_ret_grad,
            by = c("studentid" = "PIDM"))

```
